goblin.description: A green looking man jumps at you

skeleton.description: Did the pile of bones just move?

bats.description: A huge looking swarm flys towards you.

Empty.des:
A suspicios looking room.
 You get the feeling that something is wrong

Library.des:
A wierd tingle in the back of your head.
 Is it just this depressing dungeon or 
 maybe something else?

Golden Spetula.des:
Wow. You never seen such a display of arrogance.
 Maybe it should be nerfed.

spoon.des: Huh. Why spoon? You don't even eat

axe.des: Maybe go hack some wood with it.

Laboratory.description:
You walk into a room that recks of smells you never smeld before. 
 On the left is a small table with various flask on it. 
 Some contain a wierd blue liquid. On the right is a big shelf with books in a language you cant quite read.

Vektorraum.description:
On entry you get this wierd feeling.
 You see a big board with various symbols scriblet on it.
 You see three lines and in the center an arrow emerges.

Library.description:
A huge room opens up infront of you.
 The room is filled to the ceilling with shelfs 
 containing all kinds of books.
 You know that one
 what was it called ? Was it book of Ra?
